name: SafeVaultClass
title: Safe Vault Class
description: Safe Vault Class codes for insurance operations.

concept.display: Class 1 - body: Iron or Steel with any thickness, door: Iron or Steel with any thickness, including a Combination lock
concept.definition: Class 1 - body: Iron or Steel with any thickness, door: Iron or Steel with any thickness, including a Combination lock — safe vault class code.

designation.value: Classe 1 - corps: Fer ou acier toute épaisseur, porte: Fer ou acier toute épaisseur, incluant une serrure à combinaison

concept.display: Class 2 - body: Steel with 1" thickness, door: Steel with 1 ½” thickness, Combination lock OR any safe bearing UL label: Tool Resistant Safe (TL-15 Burglary), including a Combination lock equipped with a Re-Locking Device
concept.definition: Class 2 - body: Steel with 1" thickness, door: Steel with 1 ½” thickness, Combination lock OR any safe bearing UL label: Tool Resistant Safe (TL-15 Burglary), including a Combination lock equipped with a Re-Locking Device — safe vault class code.

designation.value: Classe 2 - corps: Acier 1" d'épaisseur, porte: Acier 1 ½” d'épaisseur, Serrure à combinaison OU coffre-fort affichant une étiquette UL: Résistant aux outils (TL15 Effraction), incluant une serrure à combinaison équipé d'un dispositif de re-verrouillage

concept.display: Class 3 - Any safe bearing UL labels: Safe, Class D.R., Burglary No. OR Tool Resistant Safe (TL-30 Burglary), including a combination lock equipped with a Re-Locking Device
concept.definition: Class 3 - Any safe bearing UL labels: Safe, Class D.R., Burglary No. OR Tool Resistant Safe (TL-30 Burglary), including a combination lock equipped with a Re-Locking Device — safe vault class code.

designation.value: Classe 3 - Tout coffre-fort affichant étiquettes UL: Coffre-fort, Classe "D.R.", Effraction No. OU Résistant aux outils (TL30 Effraction), incluant une serrure à combinaison équipé d'un dispositif de re-verrouillage

concept.display: Class 4 - Any safe bearing UL labels: Torch Resisting Safe (TR-30 Burglary) OR Torch and Tool Resistant Safe (TRTL-30 Burglary) OR Explosive Resisting Safe (X-60 Burglary), including a combination lock equipped with a Re-Locking Device.
concept.definition: Class 4 - Any safe bearing UL labels: Torch Resisting Safe (TR-30 Burglary) OR Torch and Tool Resistant Safe (TRTL-30 Burglary) OR Explosive Resisting Safe (X-60 Burglary), including a combination lock equipped with a Re-Locking Device. — safe vault class code.

designation.value: Classe 4 - Tout coffre-fort affichant étiquettes UL: Coffre-fort résistant au chalumeau OU Résistant aux outils et au chalumeau (TRTL30 Effraction), OU Résistant aux explosifs (X-60 Effraction), incluant une serrure à combinaison équipé d'un dispositif de re-verrouillage

concept.display: Class 5 - Any safe bearing UL labels: Torch and Tool Resistant Safe (TRTL-30x6 Burglary), Torch Resisting Safe (TR-60 Burglary), Torch and Tool Resistant Safe (TRTL-60 Burglary), Torch and Explosive Resisting Safe   (TX-60 Burglary), Torch, Explosive and Tool Resistant Safe (TXTL-60 Burglary), including a combination lock equipped with a Re-Locking Device.
concept.definition: Class 5 - Any safe bearing UL labels: Torch and Tool Resistant Safe (TRTL-30x6 Burglary), Torch Resisting Safe (TR-60 Burglary), Torch and Tool Resistant Safe (TRTL-60 Burglary), Torch and Explosive Resisting Safe   (TX-60 Burglary), Torch, Explosive and Tool Resistant Safe (TXTL-60 Burglary), including a combination lock equipped with a Re-Locking Device. — safe vault class code.

designation.value: Classe 5 - Tout coffre-fort affichant étiquettes UL: Coffre-fort résistant au chalumeau et aux outils (TRTL-30x6 Effraction), Résistant au chalumeau (TR-60 Effraction), Coffre-fort résistant au chalumeau et aux outils (TRTL-60 Effraction), Résistant au chalumeau et aux explosifs (TX-60 Effraction), Coffre-fort résistant au chalumeau, aux explosifs et aux outils (TXTL-60 Effraction), incluant une serrure à combinaison équipé d'un dispositif de re-verrouillage

concept.definition: Fire Resistant — safe vault class code.
No Safe — safe vault class code.
No Vault — safe vault class code.
Not Classified/Labelled — safe vault class code.
None/Not Applicable — safe vault class code.

concept.display: Class 1 - body: Brick, Stone, Block, Tile, Concrete, Reinforced Concrete, Iron or Steel with any thickness, door: Iron or Steel with any thickness, including a Combination lock
concept.definition: Class 1 - body: Brick, Stone, Block, Tile, Concrete, Reinforced Concrete, Iron or Steel with any thickness, door: Iron or Steel with any thickness, including a Combination lock — safe vault class code.

designation.value: Classe 1 - corps: Brique, Pierre, Bloc, Béton, Béton Armé, Fer ou Acier de toute épaisseur, porte: Fer ou Acier toute épaisseur, incluant une serrure à combinaison

concept.display: Class 2 - body: Stonework or Concrete with 36" thickness or Reinforced Concrete with 18” thickness or Steel (if constructed prior to 1983) with 1” thickness, door: Burglar Resistant Barrier Materials with 1 ½” thickness, including a Combination lock
concept.definition: Class 2 - body: Stonework or Concrete with 36" thickness or Reinforced Concrete with 18” thickness or Steel (if constructed prior to 1983) with 1” thickness, door: Burglar Resistant Barrier Materials with 1 ½” thickness, including a Combination lock — safe vault class code.

designation.value: Classe 2 - corps: Maçonnerie de pierre ou Béton épaisseur de 36” ou Béton Armé épaisseur de 18” ou Acier (si fabriqué avant 1983) épaisseur 1” , porte: Matériaux résistant aux effractions d'une épaisseur de 1 ½”, incluant une serrure à combinaison

concept.display: Class 3 - body: Stonework or Concrete with 36" thickness or Reinforced Concrete with 18” thickness or Steel (if constructed prior to 1983) with 1” thickness, door: One Burglar Resistant Barrier Material with 3 ½” thickness or Two doors same doorway, each at least 2" aggregating with 4” thickness, including a Combination lock
concept.definition: Class 3 - body: Stonework or Concrete with 36" thickness or Reinforced Concrete with 18” thickness or Steel (if constructed prior to 1983) with 1” thickness, door: One Burglar Resistant Barrier Material with 3 ½” thickness or Two doors same doorway, each at least 2" aggregating with 4” thickness, including a Combination lock — safe vault class code.

designation.value: Classe 3 - corps: Maçonnerie de pierre ou Béton épaisseur de 36” ou Béton Armé épaisseur de 18” ou Acier (si fabriqué avant 1983) épaisseur 1” , porte: Cloison avec Matériaux résistant aux effractions d'une épaisseur de 3 ½” ou Deux portes pour chaque entrée de porte, chacune d'au moins 2” donc une épaisseur de 4” au total, incluant une serrure à combinaison

concept.display: Class 5 - body: Burglary Resistant Vault Panels (ULC or ULI Class 2) or Triple or Quadruple Reinforced Concrete with 18" thickness, door: Vault Door ULC or ULI Class 2
concept.definition: Class 5 - body: Burglary Resistant Vault Panels (ULC or ULI Class 2) or Triple or Quadruple Reinforced Concrete with 18" thickness, door: Vault Door ULC or ULI Class 2 — safe vault class code.

designation.value: Classe 5 - corps: Panneaux de voûte résistant aux effractions (ULC ou ULI Classe 2) ou béton armé triple ou quadruple renforcé 18" d'epaisseur, porte: Porte de voûte ULC ou ULI Classe 2
